reviews.review: давно играю в Counter-Strike: Global Offensive мало стало читаков после читаков
Me estreso fácilmente jugando esto pero ta entrete xd

This game is broken, no in-game support or after, matchmaking and faceit are full of cheaters,trolls and throwers. Its only good for new players that want to find their aim in fps games, thats about it. You can compete only on LAN.
Unpopular opinion: CS GO is outdated. its like you are playin CS 1.6 with improved graphics.
